comment: Professor Rhiner was a very great professor. He was always willing to help students with anything. The exams are a little challenging but he does well to prepare us. Also works with you if you miss a class, but it is really important to attend every lab. Overall, great guy, he likes to tell jokes. I really enjoyed his class.
Hes amazing. I struggled with my assignments so he worked with me. Hes super caring and understanding. Take this class!!!

Professor Rhiner is a diamond in the rough. He has a passion for biology and wants to help students understand it as much as possible. I'll be honest, the content itself is always hard because that's STEM. Quiz one week, and Super quiz the next, but there are fun assignments that are worth more than the quizzes and super quizzes so don't lose hope

Consisted of 7 quizzes (lab safety + 6 pre-lab, 2 are dropped), 4 labster simulations, 3 handouts, 2 practicums, 2 exams, & 2 posters (1 being the final + a presentation). Rhiner was very helpful, & always assisted & interacted with each student. Told us exactly what to study for the 2 exams. Always clarified the on-site or online meetings weekly.

Honestly, the class is definitely hard. But Mr. Rhiner really is a wonderful professor. This being his first year of teaching university, he was very impressive and did a great job. He's willing to help his students grow, and he is very passionate about the course. I have nothing but respect for him. I'd absolutely take a class with him again.

At the time of this post, this guy is new to the university. Biology will always be a hard class no matter the instructor. Some of the previous responses here are clear that they student put zero effort into the class. The tests are hard. The quizzes are brutal but, you'll learn and you'll make it out a better student. Worth the hefty price.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Hes very passionate and fun in class, but towards the end of the sem he just disappeared. Didnt answer emails and cancelled lectures a ton. Tested over material we never learned bc he cancelled so often. LOTS of hw and assignments, tests are ALWAYS way harder thank you think theyd be, but idk if thats him or the dept. Very hard but hes kind
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy

comment: Sheesh, this class was a struggle. I think you need to be motivated for all STEM classes honestly. We had a quiz/test every week but quizzes have 2 attempts. The tests were hard and I myself have failed a few, but If you get A's on the other assignments (they are easy A's), it is still possible to get a B even if you get a 60 on every test lol.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Test heavy
